comments: Jokic (DEN) swipes down and initiates contact with Butler's (MIA) arm, which affects his driving shot attempt.
Lowry (MIA) briefly grasps Brown's (DEN) arm as they quickly disengage on the perimeter. Lowry (MIA) then brushes Brown's arm as he pursues the ball before Brown gathers to make his intended pass.
Lowry (MIA) is retreating alongside Jokic's (DEN) path and makes clean contact with the ball at the end of the drive. A jump ball should have been assessed.
Caldwell-Pope (DEN) is turning away from Martin's (MIA) path and marginal contact occurs during the pick.
Adebayo (MIA) legally contests Murray's (DEN) jump shot attempt.
Butler (MIA) clamps and holds Gordon's (DEN) arm, which affects his pursuit of the rebound.

Strus (MIA) makes clean contact with the ball as he defends Brown's (DEN) putback attempt. Any marginal contact with Butler (MIA) is initiated by Brown as he jumps from the baseline towards the basket.
Caldwell-Pope (DEN) and Strus (MIA) come together at the same spot and immediately disengage as the defensive switch occurs.
Jokic (DEN) is in the paint for less than three seconds when he moves to imminently guard an opponent.
Caldwell-Pope (DEN) is moving alongside Butler's (MIA) path and marginal body contact occurs as they come together at the end of the drive.
Gordon (DEN) is in the paint for less than three seconds when he moves to imminently guard an opponent.
Murray (DEN) legally contests Strus' (MIA) jump shot attempt.
Strus (MIA) intentionally kicks the ball.
Martin (MIA) rests is hand on Murray's (DEN) arm and marginal contact occurs at the end of the drive as Martin releases away to switch defensively.
Martin (MIA) is established in Jokic's (DEN) path and absorbs the marginal contact as Jokic starts his drive toward the basket.

Lowry (MIA) makes contact with the ball, and with the part of Jokic's (DEN) hand that is on the ball, as he defends Jokic's driving shot attempt. Any ensuing body contact as Jokic fades toward Lowry is deemed incidental.
Martin (MIA) jumps alongside Jokic's (DEN) path and marginal body contact occurs during the driving shot attempt.
Butler (MIA) uses both hands to clamp and hold Gordon's (DEN) left arm, which affects his ability to bring two hands to the loose ball for his putback shot attempt.

Murray (DEN) is moving alongside Butler's (MIA) path and maintains a legal guarding position at the end of the drive. Jokic (DEN) absorbs any marginal contact from Butler as he stops and turns to pass.
Lowry (MIA) commits a take foul on Caldwell-Pope (DEN).
Caldwell-Pope (DEN) briefly grasps Robinson's (MIA) arm and marginal contact occurs as they pursue the ball.
Jokic (DEN) is in the paint for longer than three seconds without imminently actively guarding an opponent.
Gordon (DEN) legally contests Butler's (MIA) jump shot attempt.
Strus (MIA) commits a take foul on Brown (DEN).
Adebayo (MIA) is firming up in Caldwell-Pope's (DEN) path and he absorbs the contact.
Jokic (DEN) legally contests Lowry's (MIA) jump shot attempt.
